name: Cyclists
description:
Cyclists is a 3D racing bycicists game, playable with Android devices through the Google Play store. Using your phone as a controller, tap your way to victory against friends and family in our BMX based maps!

Controls: Tap on the sides of the screen to pedal faster, and tilt your phone while flat to maneuver around corners. Pull up on the phone and hold in order to reverse.

Desktop build supports Windows, Linux, and Mac.

Mobile build supports Android.
